level.text: 2928.1 Motions for intervention are governed by Subsections 2816.2 and 2816.3.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5674, 5678 (July 14, 2006); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 9553, 9554 (December 25, 2009);s amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12541, 12578December 31, 2010).
